Summary: Sky - perfectly clear - blue. Driving west and saw a silver colored "bullet" ,motionless,no contrail.
divs: sighting detailsthe weather was perfectly clear, blue sky,no clouds and was approximetly 12:20pm. i was driving west and because the sky was so bright and clear i just glanced over the scenery and saw this big silvery thing in the south west sky. it was a "silver bullet shaped object,may of had segments or indents too. the ends were rounded like a pill carrier. i couldnt judge how far away it was. i kept looking expecting it to move like a plane but it just stayed up in the sky,no movement,no contrails. i looked for wings but all i could see vagely were the outline of triangle "hooks". the occupant in my car saw it also. have not been able to stop thinking about this. it lasted about 5 min then it disappeared. no contrails seen,it never moved..as i looked back it just disappeared. i have been thinking about this all day,have a headache\pressure. i can't explain it
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hudson
There were no other sightings in Hudson on or around February 4th 2011
